sentences.cn: 他的言论仍令人耿耿于怀。

sentences.en: The only thing that rankles me is what she says about Ireland.
sentences.cn: 唯一让我愤懑的是她有关爱尔兰的那些言论。

sentences.en: Their refusal to sell the country arms in 1937 still rankled with him.
sentences.cn: 他们在1937年拒绝向该国出售武器一事仍然令他愤愤不平。

sentences.en: They paid him only $10 for it and it really rankled.
sentences.cn: 他们为此仅支付给他10美元，真让人气愤。

sentences.en: You burrow and rankle in his heart!
sentences.cn: 你挖掘并折磨他的心灵!

trans.tran_cn: 溃烂, 发炎, 怨恨
trans.tran_en: If an event or situation rankles, it makes you feel angry or bitter afterwards, because you think it was unfair or wrong
